root.name: Aoki Densetsu Shoot!
root.description: OverviewÂ Aoki Densetsu Shoot! is a soccer management and simulation game released on both the Super Nintendo and the Game Boy. Aoki Densetsu Shoot! was developed by Affect and published by Banpresto (Game Boy version) and KSS (Super Nintendo version). Aoki Densetsu Shoot! is based on an anime of the same name.

similar_games.game: Captain Tsubasa V: Hasha no Shougou Campione
